jrobots.simulation.simulationObjects.collision

Class CollisionPanzerArena

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrobots.simulation.simulationObjects.collision.Collision
      • jrobots.simulation.simulationObjects.collision.CollisionPanzerArena
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Collision>

    public class CollisionPanzerArena
extends Collision
    Imagine between each and every Panzer there is a rope knotted. The length of this rope is the maximum diameter of the arena. Whenever two panzers getting to far away from each other, the rope tenses and drags them nearer together again. This is what this collision class is for.
